Container.Name: Ripper Transcoder
Container.Overview: An automated solution for ripping DVDs and Blurays and transcoding them to a reasonable standard
Container.Description: This container will detect optical disks by their type and rip them automatically.[BR] [BR] [B]To properly detect optical disk types in a docker environment this script relies on makemkvcon output.[/B][BR] [BR] MakeMKV is free while in Beta, but requires a valid license key. Ripper tries to fetch the latest free beta key on launch. Without a purchased license key Ripper may stop running at any time.[BR] [BR] To add your purchased license key to MakeMKV/Ripper add it to the enter-your-key-then-rename-to.settings.conf at app_Key = "[ENTER KEY HERE]" and rename the file to settings.conf.
